mapper.select: select LAST_INSERT_ID() lastNum from tbl_member group by lastNum

select b.board_id, board_title, board_content, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status, board_region, member_id, board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size from tbl_board b join tbl_board_file bf where b.board_id = bf.board_id

select m.member_id, member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_birth, member_phone, member_region, member_email, member_hi_sentence, member_profile_uuid, member_profile_original_name, member_profile_path, member_profile_size from tbl_board b join tbl_member m on b.member_id = m.member_id where board_id = #{boardId}

select board_id, m.member_region, board_title, m.member_nickname, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id where board_status = 0
and board_content like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
order by board_id desc

select board_id, board_title, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status, board_price, board_content, member_nickname, member_profile_path, member_identification, member_email, member_region, board_region from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id
order by board_id desc limit #{cri.offset}, #{cri.amount}
select count(distinct board_id) countTotalBoards from tbl_board
select count(distinct board_id) countTotalBoards from tbl_board where board_status=0

select board_id, board_region, board_title, m.member_nickname, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id order by board_id desc limit 5
select board_title from tbl_board where board_id = #{boardId}
